'''Donald Messick''' ([[7 September|September 7]], [[1926]] - [[24 October|October 24]], [[1997]]) was an American voice actor. A legend in voice acting, Messick is remembered for iconic roles such as [[wikipedia:Scooby-Doo (character)|Scooby-Doo]], [[wikipedia:Papa Smurf|Papa Smurf]], [[wikipedia:Droopy|Droopy]], [[wikipedia:Atom Ant|Atom Ant]] and a variety of animals (a market now owned by [[wikipedia:Frank Welker|Frank Welker]] and [[Dee Bradley Baker]]). 

==Roles==
* [[1977]]: [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]]: [[Balin]], [[Gwaihir|Lord of the Eagles]], [[Orcs|Goblin]], [[Troll]]
* [[1980]]: [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]]: [[Théoden|Theoden]], [[Mouth of Sauron]], [[Easterlings|Easterling]]
